title: Fdc3 UserInterface Hello
description: Hello message sent by a UI to the Desktop Agent proxy setup by `getAgent()` to indicate it is ready to communicate, containing initial CSS to set on the iframe, and including an appended `MessagePort` to be used for further communication.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation Details
implementationDetails.description: Details about the UI implementation, such as vendor and version, for logging purposes.

initialCSS.title: Initial CSS
initialCSS.description: A constrained set of styling properties that should be set on the user interface before it is displayed. Note `position` cannot be specified and should always be set to `fixed`.

height.title: height
height.description: The initial height of the iframe.

width.title: width
width.description: The initial width of the iframe.

zIndex.title: zIndex
zIndex.description: The initial zindex to apply to the iframe.

left.title: left
left.description: The initial left property to apply to the iframe.

top.title: top
top.description: The initial top property to apply to the iframe.

bottom.title: bottom
bottom.description: The initial bottom property to apply to the iframe.

right.title: right
right.description: The initial right property to apply to the iframe.

transition.title: transition
transition.description: The transition property to apply to the iframe.

maxHeight.title: maxHeight
maxHeight.description: The maximum height to apply to the iframe.

maxWidth.title: maxWidth
maxWidth.description: The maximum with to apply to the iframe.
